name: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Beta Test Ver. 2
name_original: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Beta Test Ver. 2
description:
This is the NARUTO TO BORUTO: Shinobi Striker - Open Beta for July 19-22.

Schedule for the Beta Test is as follows (PDT):
• 7/19 (Thurs) 23:00~02:00
• 7/20 (Fri) 13:00~16:00
• 7/21 (Sat) 02:00~05:00, 10:00~13:00, 18:00~21:00, 23:00~02:00

The second NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER open beta test is underway!

This game data is exclusively for beta testing NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER, an acrobatic ninja action game where players can compete in 4 on 4 battles together with online friends, and can only be played during the beta test period.

As a tester, we hope you will also answer our beta tester survey on our official website.

http://naruto-action.bn-ent.net/

Remote Play requires PS Vita system and sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

1 player
Network Players 2-8
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
Online Play (Required)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
